PageFaqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
PageFaqs.question1: How can I see a list of all the people who have visited the rectory up to today?
PageFaqs.question2: How to schedule an appointment for a specific date or day and time?
PageFaqs.question3: How to quickly schedule day-to-day, a person who arrives immediately at the rectory?
PageFaqs.question4: How to view statistics and graphical reports of the people who visited the rectory on a certain date or month to month?
PageFaqs.question5: How to generate reports and see a detailed list with the date and time information of scheduling?
PageFaqs.question6: How to generate a PDF report with the information of the people who visited the rectory in a certain period of time or up to today?

response1.p1: To see all the people who are scheduled and registered in the application for a visit to the rectory, you must go to the People section, which is located in the top bar of all sections of the application and access that option to see all the relevant information of each person.

response2.p1: To schedule an appointment with the rectory of the ITFIP (Schedule a person) you must go to the Schedule section, at the top of the application's options bar. Once in the calendar view, select the day by clicking on the box and inside on the number of the day or on the side bar of the scheduling calendar click on week (week) or day (day) to schedule on the day you have selected and finally drag and drop until the time you require the appointment.
response2.p2: Complete the scheduling form with all the requested data, finally submit the form to complete the process.
response2.p3: Note: The selected day or week in the scheduling calendar can be changed easily and simply using the arrows that appear at the top left of the calendar.
response2.p4: The button today serves to easily position yourself on the current day and/or current date of the scheduling calendar.

response3.p1: Scheduling day-to-day means scheduling the person at the same moment they have arrived at the Rectory and the Rector is available to attend to them at that moment, so at this moment the scheduling is done, for that go to the option of Schedule, and then complete the scheduling form, which is the same except for the difference of selecting the date and time, since it is at the same moment and this is saved automatically when submitting the form.

response4.p1: To view a graphical report and visually better and more interactive information, you must go to the Reports section, and click on the dropdown menu, then select the option Graphs report scheduling and you only need to select the date range between which you want to see the information.
response4.p2: You can freely and interactively choose the type of graph to read and/or consume the information.

response5.p1: To generate reports and be able to view them easily, you must go to the Reports section, and click on the dropdown menu. then select the option Generate scheduling report and then select the date between which you want the report, you can also specify the type of person who visited the rectory and click on Filter, to get the report.

response6.p1: To generate a PDF report and save it locally on the device, you must go to the Reports section, and click on the dropdown menu, then select the option Generate scheduling report, and then complete the options you require to filter the information, then click on Download or in View to view the report before downloading it.
response6.p2: Note:The option View only works on computers or desktop laptops; on mobile phones that run a browser different from a desktop version, it cannot be done.

FullCalendar.unavailable: Schedules not available at that time.
FullCalendar.timeout: It cannot be scheduled on a date that has already passed.
